mapper.select:
SELECT comment_id, playgoer.playgoer_id, playgoer_name, playgoer_avatar, comment_info, comm.updated_at FROM playgoer INNER JOIN (SELECT comment_id, playgoer_id, comment_info, updated_at FROM opera_video_comment WHERE video_id = #{videoId} AND is_delete = 0 limit
#{page},
10) AS comm ON comm.playgoer_id = playgoer.playgoer_id ORDER BY comm.updated_at DESC

SELECT com.video_id, com.comment_id, com.comment_info, com.filename, com.updated_at, opera_type.type_name FROM opera_type INNER JOIN (SELECT ov.video_id, type_id, filename, comment_id, comment_info, ovc.updated_at FROM opera_video AS ov INNER JOIN (SELECT comment_id, video_id, comment_info, updated_at FROM opera_video_comment WHERE is_delete = 0 AND playgoer_id = #{playgoerId}) AS ovc ON ov.video_id = ovc.video_id) AS com ON opera_type.type_id = com.type_id ORDER BY com.updated_at DESC
